sourcesContent:
export const projects_mobile = [
    {
        title: "CUDA (Mobile App)",
        description: "CUDA was the 3rd place winner of the " +
            "2021-2022 UCSB E.C.E. Capstone " +
            "program. The project goal was to " +
            "produce fast and inexpensive " +
            "medical tests that users can trust. " +
            "The CUDA Reader is a portable device " +
            "capable of detecting COVID-19 as " +
            "well as aiding in the detection of " +
            "trauma-induced coagulopathy. The " +
            "CUDA Reader’s companion, a cross-platform " +
            "mobile app, allows users to " +
            "monitor nearby devices and store " +
            "results in the cloud.",
        stack: ["Javascript", "React Native", "Firebase Realtime Database"],
        keywords: ["medical", "", "cross-platform"],
        github_link: "",
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Geo-tagged Social Media",
        description: "Socialize by uploading, commenting, and rating geo-tagged photo posts",
        stack: ["Javascript"],
        keywords: ["React Native", "Cross-platform", "Google Maps API", "geolocation"],
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Thermocouple Monitor",
        description: "Receives Bluetooth Low Energy updates from an esp32 microcontroller and displays the current temperature for the user. ",
        stack: ["Swift"],
        keywords: ["iOS", "thermocouple", "bluetooth", "ble", "esp32"],
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
];

export const projects_web = [
    {
        title: "noah.coffee",
        description: "Personal portfolio website with contact info",
        stack: ["Javascript", "CSS"],
        keywords: ["React.js", "Node.js"],
        demo_link: "https://noah.coffee/",
        github_link: "",
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "anoroc.com",
        description: "One of my first ever projects, and a favor for my grandpa - the owner of a sheet metal manufacturing company named ANOROC, Inc. I built this website when I was 10 years old, in 2011. While the site is no longer in service, you can still explore the site using the Wayback Machine!",
        stack: ["HTML", "CSS"],
        keywords: ["Web design", "Sheet metal", "Commercial website"],
        demo_link: "http://example.com",
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
];

export const projects_embedded = [
    {
        title: "CUDA (Embedded App)",
        description: "CUDA was the 3rd place winner of the " +
            "2021-2022 UCSB E.C.E. Capstone " +
            "program. The project goal was to " +
            "produce fast and inexpensive " +
            "medical tests that users can trust. " +
            "The CUDA Reader is a portable device " +
            "capable of detecting COVID-19 as " +
            "well as aiding in the detection of " +
            "trauma-induced coagulopathy. The " +
            "device uses a Raspberry Pi to " +
            "interface with a variety of components, " +
            "such as a microcontroller and real-time clock. " +
            "Bluetooth Low Energy is used to communicate " +
            "the necessary data to nearby devices running the " +
            "companion CUDA mobile app. ",
        stack: ["Python"],
        keywords: ["Raspberry Pi", "electrochemical measurement", "Bluetooth Low Energy"],
        github_link: "",
        microcontrollers: ["esp32"],
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Solar Battery Charger with Active Tracking",
        description: "Personal portfolio and contact website",
        stack: ["Javascript"],
        keywords: ["React.js", "Node.js", "servo", "3D printing", "18650", ],
        demo_link: "https://noah.coffee/",
        github_link: "",
        microcontrollers: ["esp32"],
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Thermocouple BLE Transceiver",
        description: "Thermocouple sensor application that also acts as a GATT server, advertising temperature data over Bluetooth Low Energy",
        stack: ["C++"],
        keywords: ["esp32", "thermocouple", "bluetooth", "ble"],
        demo_link: "https://noah.coffee/",
        github_link: "",
        microcontrollers: ["esp32"],
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Guitar Tuner",
        description: "",
        stack: ["C++"],
        keywords: ["audio processing", "fast Fourier transforms", "LCD programming", "embedded UI design"],
        demo_link: "https://noah.coffee/",
        github_link: "",
        microcontrollers: ["STM32"],
        images: [],
    },
];

export const projects_ml = [
    {
        title: "Pacman Agent",
        description: "",
        stack: ["Python", "scikit-learn"],
        keywords: ["games"],
        demo_link: "http://example.com",
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Fashion Classifier",
        description: "",
        stack: ["Python", "scikit-learn"],
        keywords: ["MNIST", "classification", "fashion"],
        demo_link: "http://example.com",
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Linear Classifier",
        description: "",
        stack: ["Python", "scikit-learn"],
        keywords: ["MNIST", "classification", "fashion"],
        demo_link: "http://example.com",
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
    {
        title: "Naive Bayes Classifier",
        description: "",
        stack: ["Python", "scikit-learn"],
        keywords: ["MNIST", "classification", "fashion"],
        demo_link: "http://example.com",
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
];

export const projects_media = [
    {
        title: "Tempo Estimator",
        description: "",
        stack: ["Python"],
        keywords: ["signal processing", "audio", "feature analysis"],
        demo_link: "http://example.com",
        github_link: "http://example.com",
        images: [],
    },
];
